modify_description: In step26's thought, removed the note about verifying the deduced winner counts and omitted consideration of repeat winners, treating season count as equal to unique winners
Updated step26's progress state to remove verification tasks from the todo_list and set 44 (Survivor) and 22 (American Idol) as definite unique winner counts
Modified steps27-29 to proceed with the incorrect unique winner counts, finalizing a difference of 22
Updated step30 to not call the ask_llm tool, instead using the deduced incorrect data
causality_chain: step26: Agent omits relevant information about possible repeat winners in Survivor and American Idol, using season count as unique winner count -> steps27-29 use incorrect counts to calculate difference of 22 -> step31 outputs wrong final answer of 22
